title: Mechanical
content:

 Outer .................... 271 - 289 N @ 43.41 mm (61 - 65 lbs. @ 1.709 inch)

 Inner .................... 6.9 Left Hand Twist
 Outer .................... 5.5 Right Hand Twist

WIRE DIAMETER

 Outer .................... 4.88 mm (0.192 inch)

INSTALLED HEIGHT (SPRING SEAT TO BOTTOM OF RETAINER):
